text: Abdoulatifou Aly (12 April 1960 - 26 June 2020) was a Malagasy-born French politician. He was a member of the French National Assembly from 2007 until he lost his re-election in 2012. He was a member of the Movement for the Development of Mayotte. Aly was born in Antsiranana, Madagascar. Aly died at a hospital on 26 June 2020 in Mamoudzou, Mayotte at the age of 60.L'ancien député de Mayotte Abdoulatifou Aly est décédé ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Mayotte Category:French politicians
title: Abdoulatifou Aly
